text: (See they not) were the disbelievers of Mecca not informed in the Book (that Allah enlargeth the provision) gives abundant wealth (for whom He will) and this could be a lure to his perdition, (and straiteneth (it for whom He will)) out of care for him. (Lo! Herein) in that which I have mentioned of enlargement and straitening (indeed are portents) signs and lessons (for folk who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
